attributes.action: Inquiry into the DVLA’s performance during the Covi-19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Delays such as a 6 month wait for a medical restricted licence to be reissued are completely unacceptable.
attributes.background: In my view the DVLA are not fit-for-purpose. An inquiry needs to be held into their performance during the pandemic. This should lead to more efficient customer service, treatment of those with medical issues, and more.
